text: Angélica Gorodischer (28 July 1928 - 5 February 2022) was an Argentine writer. She was born in Buenos Aires, Argentina. She was known for her collection of short stories, which belong to a wide variety of genres, including science- fiction, fantasy, crime and stories with a feminist perspective. Biography (Spanish) Gorodischer died on 5 February 2022 at her home in Rosario, Argentina from cancer at the age of 93.Murió Angélica Gorodischer, una de las referentes de la literatura argentina ==Some books== * Cuentos con soldados (Premio Club del Orden, Santa Fe, 1965. stories) * Opus Dos (Ediciones Minotauro, Buenos Aires, 1967. novel) * Las pelucas (Editorial Sudamericana, Buenos Aires, 1968. stories) * Bajo las jubeas en flor (Ediciones De La Flor, Buenos Aires, 1973. stories) * Casta luna electrónica (Ediciones Andrómeda, 1977. stories) * Trafalgar (El Cid Editor, Buenos Aires, 1979. stories) * Prodigios. Barcelona: Ed. Lumen, 1994. (novel) * Tecnicas de supervivencia. Rosario: Ed. Municipal Rosario, 1994. (stories) * Buenos Aires: Emecé, 1996. (novel) * Cómo triunfar en la vida. Buenos Aires, Emecé, 1998. (stories) ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Writers from Buenos Aires Category:Cancer deaths in Argentina
title: Angélica Gorodischer
